examples.english: No, that is not my book.
There is a meeting at ten o'clock.
I go for a walk in the morning.
Let us drink tea in the evening.
My father went to the office.
My elder brother lives in Hyderabad.
My elder sister is a doctor.
I am reading a Telugu book.
This road goes to the city.
I have a lot of work today.
Let us go to the market.
